headline: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) Partners With Cognizant For AI-Powered Dispute Management Solution
summary: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW), in collaboration with Cognizant, introduced an AI-powered dispute management solution for mid-market banks in North America. This strategic move highlights the company's ongoing commitment to enhancing financial solutions. Despite a predominantly flat market over the last week and investor apprehension surrounding new U.S. auto tariffs, ServiceNow's stock experienced minimal movement. Broader market trends showed a slight decline in major indices like the Dow Jones and...

headline: Cognizant and ServiceNow Launch AI-Powered Dispute Management Solution for Mid-Market Banks
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) announced today the launch of an AI-powered dispute management solution in partnership with ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW). This Business Process as a Service (BPaaS) offering is specifically designed for mid-market banks in North America with the goal of streamlining the dispute resolution process and enhancing customer satisfaction.
